thread.title: Kelsey P
thread.title_full: Smart Start, Inc. reviewed by Kelsey P

author: Kelsey P
title: Kelsey P
text: After multiple failed attempts at getting help, I finally got in touch with someone that was willing to help. Brittany did an EXCELLENT job. She took the time to listen to my problem and even took the time to give me a PROPER tutorial on how to use my device. When I first called I was extremely frustrated and disappointed but she worked with me and even called me back at a time that was convenient for me in order to make sure my device was working properly and that I understood how to use it.
